channel.title: Gameplay stuck in run mode
channel.description:
Hi.... new here so please be gentle ;o)
My game seems to be stuck in run mode like I had the shift key pressed... I reloaded previous game saves where I was able to walk and Freeman runs everywhere now.... I've tried resetting the keybinding to default but this hasn't changed anything, Freeman still runs everywhere... what have I messed up?
Thanks in advance for any pointers to help me fix this!

item.title: Gameplay stuck in run mode
item.dc:creator: Fr0z3n
item.description:
Go to Options > Black Mesa and uncheck “Always Run”

The option wasn’t working before, but the recent patch fixed it and in the process of doing so made it on-by-default for all players. Whoops. I guess Gordon didn’t want to be late to work again.
